snippet.title: Hood Story: Kaito Yamazaki Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Download the demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1768200/Hood_Story_Kaito_Yamazaki/

HSKY twitter: https://twitter.com/KenzoGames3

"Play as "Kaito Yamazaki" a young Japanese delinquent from the underprivileged neighborhood of Kamagasaki in Osaka. He will have to juggle between love, friendship and violence to put an end to this gang war."

 "Hood Story: Kaito Yamazaki" is a BeatEmUP / RPG life simulator in the urban area of ​​nishinari-ku in osaka, with a real-time open world, alive and filled with side activities. The story is based on a gang war of young delinquents between two rival neighborhoods of nishinari-ku in osaka, the main character is a young adult named kaito yamazaki he grew up in an underprivileged area of ​​kamagasaki.
